title: RETURN TO INVOICE -
sample_text:
Passenger Carrying Vehicle Package Policy - Annual
In consideration of the payment of additional premium paid by the Insured and realized by the Insurer not withstanding anything 
to the contrary, it is hereby understood & agreed that for the purpose of this policy, in the event of Total Loss (TL) or a Constructive 
Loss (CL), the insurer will pay the insured, the difference between the ‘claim amount receivable’ under the motor package policy 
and the ‘value of vehicle’ as per the first sale of invoice of new vehicle along with the first time registration charges and road 
tax which was incurr
